title: BLISS Method for Shelter Site Selection
brief: Using the BLISS acronym to choose optimal shelter locations for concealment and safety.
steps: B - Blend in with surroundings: choose sites that match natural environment.
L - Low silhouette: avoid hilltops and exposed ridgelines.
I - Irregular shape: avoid geometric patterns that stand out.
S - Small: keep shelter size minimal to reduce visibility.
S - Secluded location: choose hidden areas away from travel routes.
warnings: Avoid flash flood areas in foothills
Avoid avalanche or rockslide areas in mountains
Stay away from sites below high water marks near bodies of water
Consider seasonal changes in site requirements
